channel.title: Problem with steam server browser
channel.description:
Since the big engine updates I only find about 100-200 servers for each game, and all of them seem to be from my country. I also can't join friends when they are ingame anymore. It all worked perfectly before the updates.
Don't say anything like "open ports" or "disable firewall", I tried that.

item.title: Problem with steam server browser
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
give it time, send error report if possible, i had similar problems in the past, and solved it by uninstalling steam and reinstalling, you could try that, but backup all your shizzle so you dont lose enay!

Read full topic
